content:
I have installed the sandbox following instructions from https://github.com/smart-on-fhir/installer following section Building SMART-on-FHIR on fresh Ubuntu 16.04 machine (without Vagrant). All the services come up successfully.
I next try to create a user through the local smart server (port 9090), which redirects me to local oauth server (9085) and this redirects me to hspconsortium.org . Please see attached image.I manage to create the account.
Problem is when i try to login with the same user name and password on the local smart server (port 9090) , it says - The system was unable to log you in. Please try again.
Looks like the initial creation of new user is done in some other system, and not on the local oauth server. Do you think the same.
Do I need to do some configuration changes to point to right servers internally for the sandbox ?
We are really very eager to start using this system. Appreciate your help

Thanks
